PLTRFM_Phone1.title: Connect and Network
PLTRFM_Phone1.text: Connect with clients or freelancers you work with regularly, and build your network by adding new contacts.

PLTRFM_Phone2.title: INSTANT CHAT
PLTRFM_Phone2.text: Start all of your conversations in one place, share files, and make communication between contractors and clients secure and easy.

PLTRFM_Phone3.title: PERSONAL PROFILE
PLTRFM_Phone3.text: Create a profile and spotlight your skills, showcase your portfolio, and share details about your experience.
